trans-unit.source: Provides default functionality for all SOAP attributes.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有 SOAP 特性的默认功能。

trans-unit.source: The SoapAttribute is nonfunctional, and can be used only as the base class for SOAP attributes.
trans-unit.target: SoapAttribute 不起作用，并可以用于 SOAP 特性只能用作基类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the type must be nested during SOAP serialization.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否必须在 SOAP 序列化过程中嵌套类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the target object must be nested during SOAP serialization; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目标对象必须嵌套在 SOAP 序列化; 过程，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace to which the target of the current SOAP attribute is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 当前 SOAP 属性的目标序列化到 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: You can get or set the value of the ProtXmlNamespace field through the public <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute.XmlNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取或设置通过公共 ProtXmlNamespace 字段的值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute.XmlNamespace%2A>属性。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute.XmlNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reflection object used by attribute classes derived from the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute"></xref> class to set XML serialization information.
trans-unit.target: 使用派生自的特性类的反射对象<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute"></xref>类来设置 XML 序列化信息。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the ReflectInfo field directly.
trans-unit.target: 不需要直接使用 ReflectInfo 字段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the target of the current attribute will be serialized as an XML attribute instead of an XML field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前属性的目标将序列化为 XML 特性而不是 XML 字段。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a field `FieldA` of an object `ObjectB` is qualified with the `SoapFieldAttribute(UseAttribute=true)` attribute, `FieldA` will be serialized as `<ObjectB><FieldA>5</FieldA></ObjectB>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果字段`FieldA`对象的`ObjectB`是用限定`SoapFieldAttribute(UseAttribute=true)`属性，`FieldA`将序列化为`<ObjectB><FieldA>5</FieldA></ObjectB>`。

trans-unit.source: If the UseAttribute property is set to `false`, `FieldA` will be serialized as `<ObjectB FieldA="5"></ObjectB>`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UseAttribute 属性设置为`false`，`FieldA`将序列化为`<ObjectB FieldA="5"></ObjectB>`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the target object of the current attribute must be serialized as an XML attribute; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the target object must be serialized as a subelement.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前的属性的目标对象必须序列化为 XML 特性;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果必须序列化目标对象作为一个子元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML namespace name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 XML 命名空间名称。

trans-unit.source: If the current property returns `null`, then the namespace is not qualified.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的属性返回`null`，则不限定命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace name under which the target of the current attribute is serialized.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空间名称在其下序列化当前的属性的目标。
